TEXT.TITLE: HARTFORD STEAM <HBOL> SETS SPLIT, DIVIDEND HIKE
TEXT.BODY: Hartford Steam Boiler Inspection and Insurance Co said its board declared a two-for-one stock split and raised the quarterly dividend to 25 cts postsplit from 20 cts, both payable April 30 to holders of record April 10. Reuter
